overview: The film centers on a big Polish family. Jadzia is the mother and the ruler of the Pzoniak family (she has five children). Though she's happily married to Bolek, she is also having a long-time affair with Roman. Her young daughter Hala is having an affair with neighbour cop Russell and becomes pregnant by him. Russell is pressed hard to marry Hala.
tagline: Sometimes the further you stray, the closer you are to home.
cast: Claire Danes|Lena Olin|Gabriel Byrne|Mili Avital|Daniel Lapaine
